Download. Install. Relax. The new FDA regulations that took effect August 8, 2016 are making online sales more complicated for e-cigarette and vaporizer merchants. To keep it simple for you, we’ve partnered with BlueCheck, a plugin that helps you comply with the new FDA age verification regulations.
BlueCheck offers these key features and more:
- FDA compliance. Compliance assistance with the latest state and federal age verification laws. - One-click install. Incorporates easily into your BigCommerce store. - 20-second verification. Verifies IDs in 20 seconds or less for all 50 states and international IDs.*
Getting started with BlueCheck BlueCheck is easy to install and use with your BigCommerce store. Learn more and download the plugin from the BigCommerce marketplace.
